data.title: As 'All My Children' Ends, Susan Lucci Says Goodbye
data.meta_description: Fans have been following the drama of Pine Valley — the fictitious  Philadelphia suburb where the show takes place — since 1970, and much of  that drama has revolved around Lucci's character, Erica Kane. But her reign comes to an end Friday as ABC airs the soap's final episode.
